roleset.name: have fond feelings for

example.name: both args
example.text: We both adore her very well and admire her immensely.

roleset.note: Frame created by Arrick. Member of Vncls admire-31.2. other members include admire, cherish, distrust, envy, favor, grudge, loathe, love, pity, relish, savor, tolerate, value, and worship.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'adore' based on sentences in EBC.
